snippet: An Arkansas man who police say became lost while driving in Chicago was shot and killed early Thursday, apparently by a man he had just asked for directions.
abstract: Chicago police say Robert Franklin, Arkansas man who became lost while driving in the city, was shot and killed by a man he had asked for directions.
lead_paragraph: An Arkansas man who police say became lost while driving in Chicago was shot and killed early Thursday, apparently by a man he had just asked for directions.

headline.main: Illinois: Lost Driver Is Shot to Death
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Lost Driver Is Shot To Death
